message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I understand its value to you stands at $12000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9500, a saving of $2500 compared to its market value. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item that could significantly enhance your experience. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations.
